 If you were under a rock yesterday, or asleep listening to the latest GIGPOD, you‚Äôll no doubt have seen our draw for the Champions League.


‚≠ê We have been drawn in Group F of the @ChampionsLeague - Fixtures TBC #CelticFC | #UCLdraw pic.twitter.com/IfDpVHtog2‚Äî Celtic Football Club (@CelticFC) August 25, 2022
